fields_of_interest: Trade, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Research and innovation, External Relations
eu_initiatives: Trade defence instruments. Harmonised standards. Brexit strategy. Import and export monitoring.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Lobbying national parliament, press releases, industry events. Collaboration with European equivalent bodies.
goals__remit:
UK Steel is the trade association for the UK steel industry. 
We represent the sector’s interests to government and champion our modern, vibrant and dynamic industry to the public.
